Class UpdateLogServiceImpl

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, UpdateLogService
public class UpdateLogServiceImpl extends org.forgerock.json.resource.AbstractRequestHandler implements UpdateLogService
Endpoint for managing history of product updates.
